Welcome to Cholla!

September 22, 2015

This is a test post to remind us how to deal with code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Brant')
#=> prints 'Hi, Brant' to STDOUT.
Evan Schneider Cholla development blog
